name: Galacta Roll
description:
Conquer the galaxy in this sparkly dice game!

Instructions
This game has two phases. In the first, you roll your dice. In the second, you use the results to move your character closer to the goal. However, every dice you roll stays in the box, ready to give you their effects.

The Dice

Your very own sparkly character!

Your less generic than usual number dice!

Your shiny directional dice!

 

The soon to be yours goal!

And finally, a squeaky-clean ground! (I mean, just look at those stars)

Roll them all within the box, a delicate frame that will serve as your map in an adventure that will let you reeling (or should I say, rolling)

Developed by Mich-357 and Errena Storm
